warning.skill.lack_hp: You don't have enough HP to use this skill.
warning.skill.lack_mp: You don't have enough MP to use this skill.
warning.skill.wrong_weapon: The skill cannot be used with the equipped item.
warning.skill.no_weapon: Since you are not using a weapon, you are unable to attack.
warning.skill.lack_arrow: You have used up all of your arrows.
warning.skill.lack_throwing_star: You have used up all of your throwing-stars.
warning.skill.in_cd: You may not use the skill yet. (Time left: %s sec)
warning.equip.invalid_stat: Your stats are too low to equip this item.
warning.cannot_sell: This item can not be sold.
warning.blind: You are in a state of darkness, so your accuracy will be decreased.
warning.seal: Your skill has been sealed up, making you unable to use it.
warning.allocate_sp.2: You have to allocate at least 61 SP on 1st job skills first.
warning.allocate_sp.3: You have to allocate at least 182 SP on 1st or 2nd job skills first.
warning.allocate_sp.4: You have to allocate at least 333 SP on 1st, 2nd or 3rd job skills first.
skill.description.0001000:
[Master Level : 3]
Hurls snail shells to attack monsters from long distance.
skill.description.0001001:
[Master Level : 3]
Enables the user to recover HP constantly for 30 sec. 
§6Terms between skills : 2 min.§r
skill.description.0001002:
[Master Level : 3]
Enables the character to move around quickly for a short amount of time. 
§6Terms between skills : 1 min.§r
skill.description.1000000:
[Master Level : 16]
Recover additional HP every 5 sec. while standing still.
skill.description.1000001:
[Master Level : 10]
This skill boosts up the amount of increase on Max HP after each Level UP, or AP used on Max HP.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Improving HP Recovery.§r
skill.description.1000002:
[Master Level : 8]
Even when hanging on the rope or on a ladder, you'll be able to recover some HP after a certain amount of time.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Improving Max HP Increase.§r
skill.description.1001003:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily increases your weapon defense.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Endure§r
skill.description.1001004:
[Master Level : 20]
Use MP to deliver a killer blow to the monsters with a sword.
skill.description.1001005:
[Master Level : 20]
Use HP and MP to attack every enemy around you with a sword.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 1 on Power Strike§r
skill.description.2000000:
[Master Level : 16]
Recovering even more MP every 10 sec. The higher the level of the character and the skill level, the more recovery it enables the character to have.
skill.description.2000001:
[Master Level : 10]
This skill boosts up the amount of increase on Max MP after each Level UP, or AP used on Max MP.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Improving MP Recovery§r
skill.description.2001002:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily replaces damage with MP instead of HP. If MP reaches 0, the HP takes a full hit.
skill.description.2001003:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily boosts the weapon def. of the armor by blowing magic into it.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Magic Guard§r
skill.description.2001004:
[Master Level : 20]
Use MP to attack one enemy.
skill.description.2001005:
[Master Level : 20]
Use MP to attack an enemy twice.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 1 on Energy Bolt§r
skill.description.3000001:
[Master Level : 20]
Launches a critical attack with a given success rate.
skill.description.3000002:
[Master Level : 8]
Increases the range of attack for bows and crossbows.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on The Blessing of Amazon§r
skill.description.3001003:
[Master Level : 20]
Focusing to temporarily increase accuracy and avoidability.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on The Blessing of Amazon§r
skill.description.3001004:
[Master Level : 20]
Fires an arrow with authority. Applies more damage than usual.
skill.description.3001005:
[Master Level : 20]
Fires two arrows at once to attack an enemy twice.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 1 on Arrow Blow§r
skill.description.4000001:
[Master Level : 8]
Increases the range of attack using throwing weapons such as throwing stars & knives.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Nimble Body§r
skill.description.4001002:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily decreases the weapon def. and attacking abilities of the affected, even stunting the ongoing attacks. Can't use this skill on a monster that's already in "disorder."
skill.description.4001003:
[Master Level : 20]
Use MP to hide behind the shadows. Can't be attacked, and can't attack either.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Disorder§r
skill.description.4001334:
[Master Level : 20]
Use MP to quickly stab a monster twice in one turn using a dagger.
skill.description.4001344:
[Master Level : 20]
Use MP to throw 2 throwing stars and apply damage based on LUK, regardless of the rate of Claw Mastery.
skill.description.1100000:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the sword mastery and accuracy. It only applies when either a one-handed or a two-handed sword is in hand.
skill.description.1100001:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the axe mastery and accuracy. It only applies when either a one-handed or a two-handed axe is in hand.
skill.description.1100002:
[Master Level : 30]
Strikes an another, far deadlier blow following the initial attack with a given success rate. It works only when holding a one-hand or two-hand sword.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Sword Mastery§r
skill.description.1100003:
[Master Level : 30]
Strikes an another, far deadlier blow following the initial attack with a given success rate. It works only when holding a one-hand or two-hand axe.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Axe Mastery§r
skill.description.1101004:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the equipped sword. It only applies when either a one-handed or a two-handed sword is in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Sword Mastery§r
skill.description.1101005:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the equipped axe. It only applies when either a one-handed or a two-handed axe is in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Axe Mastery§r
skill.description.1101006:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily boosts the weapon attack level of everyone in the party around the area, but also decreases the level of weapon attack defense.
skill.description.1101007:
[Master Level : 30]
Returns a portion of the damage received from the enemy. Can't return more than 10% of the enemy's Max HP at once, however.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Rage§r
skill.description.1200001:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the mastery of blunt weapons and accuracy. It only applies when either a one-handed or a two-handed blunt weapon is in hand.
skill.description.1200003:
[Master Level : 30]
Strikes an another, far deadlier blow following the initial attack with a given success rate. It works only when holding a one-hand or two-hand blunt weapon.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on BW Mastery§r
skill.description.1201005:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the equipped blunt weapon. It only applies when either a one-handed or a two-handed blunt weapon is in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on BW Mastery§r
skill.description.1201006:
[Master Level : 20]
Threatens an enemy for a set duration. Reduce the Weapon Attack and Weapon Defense of multiple enemies within a certain range.
skill.description.1201007:
[Master Level : 30]
Returns a portion of the damage received from the enemy. Can't return more than 10% of the enemy's Max HP at once, however.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Threaten§r
skill.description.1300000:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the spear mastery and accuracy. It only applies when a spear is in hand.
skill.description.1300001:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the mastery of pole arms and accuracy. It only applies when a pole arm is in hand.
skill.description.1300002:
[Master Level : 30]
Strikes an another, far deadlier blow following the initial attack with a given success rate. It works only when holding a one-hand or two-hand spear.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Spear Mastery§r
skill.description.1300003:
[Master Level : 30]
Strikes an another, far deadlier blow following the initial attack with a given success rate. It works only when holding a one-hand or two-hand pole arm.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Pole Arm Mastery§r
skill.description.1301004:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the equipped spear. It only applies when a spear is in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Spear Mastery§r
skill.description.1301005:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the equipped pole arm. It only applies when a pole arm is in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Pole Arm Mastery§r
skill.description.1301006:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily increases the level of weapon and magic defense on every member of the party around the area.
skill.description.1301007:
[Master Level : 30]
Temporarily increases the Max HP and Max MP of all members of the party around the area.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Iron Will§r
skill.description.2100000:
[Master Level : 20]
Absorbs the enemy's MP when attacking with Magic skills, until it reaches 0.
skill.description.2101001:
[Master Level : 20]
Meditate for a bit to temporarily boost up the magic attack of party members around the area.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on MP Eater§r
skill.description.2101002:
[Master Level : 20]
Use Move, Jump, or Sneak keys to teleport to other places in the same map on a set distance.
§6Hot key:
Throw out any of the skill items§r
skill.description.2101002_hint:
§6§lHot key activated!§r
Throw out any of the skill items to use Teleport.
Please make sure you have at least 1 item left in your hand after throwing an item.
skill.description.2101003:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily slows down the movement of up to 6 monsters. Cannot be used on the same monsters more than twice in a row.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Teleport§r
skill.description.2101004:
[Master Level : 30]
Attacks a single monster with a fire arrow using the magic power. Applies 1.5 times the damage to the ice-based enemies, whereas fire-based enemies receive half the damage, if that.
skill.description.2101005:
[Master Level : 30]
Attacks a single monster by splashing a Poison drop. With a given success rate, the monster gets temporarily poisoned.
skill.description.2201004:
[Master Level : 30]
Attacks a single monster with a sharp piece of Ice. The monster will freeze if hit. Damages the fire-based enemies 1.5 times more, where as the ice-based enemies get only half the damage.
skill.description.2201005:
[Master Level : 30]
Attacks surrounding monsters with a thunder bolt. All monsters in the range receive damage.
skill.description.2301002:
[Master Level : 30]
Recovers the HP of all party members around the area. The amount of healing depends on the number of people being healed, and the undead monster in the vicinity of this will receive damage.
skill.description.2301003:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily decreases the weapon damage received. It has no effect, however, on the magic attack.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Heal§r
skill.description.2301004:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily increases the weapon def., magic def., accuracy, and avoidability of all party members around the area. This cannot be combined with a skill or a potion.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Invincible§r
skill.description.2301005:
[Master Level : 30]
Attacks a single monster by firing Holy Arrows. Very effective against the undead's or devil-based monsters.
skill.description.3100000:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the bow mastery and accuracy. It only applies when a bow is in hand.
skill.description.3100001:
[Master Level : 30]
Strikes an another, far deadlier blow following the initial attack with a given success rate. It works only when holding a bow.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Bow Mastery§r
skill.description.3101002:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the bow. It only works with a bow in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Bow Mastery§r
skill.description.3101003:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the success rate for pushing off the monsters when swinging a bow.  As the level rises, the number of monsters that one can push off with one swing increases.
skill.description.3101004:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily allows the character to fire bow arrows without using up the arrows. Only works with a bow in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Bow Booster§r
skill.description.3101005:
[Master Level : 30]
Fires arrows with bombs attached to it. If struck cleanly, the bomb explodes on the enemy, knocking out some of the enemies around with a certain success rate. Can't attack more than 6 at once, and it only works with a bow in hand.
skill.description.3200000:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the crossbow mastery and accuracy. It only applies when a crossbow is in hand.
skill.description.3200001:
[Master Level : 30]
Strikes an another, far deadlier blow following the initial attack with a given success rate. It works only when holding a crossbow.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Crossbow Mastery§r
skill.description.3201002:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the crossbow. It only works with a crossbow in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Crossbow Mastery§r
skill.description.3201003:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the success rate for pushing off the monsters when swinging a crossbow.  As the level rises, the number of monsters that one can push off with one swing increases.
skill.description.3201004:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily allows the character to fire crossbow arrows without using up the arrows. Only works with a crossbow in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Crossbow Booster§r
skill.description.3201005:
[Master Level : 30]
Attacks up to 6 monsters at once with a powerful arrow, which penetrates through them. Damage decreases as the arrow flies through.
skill.description.4100000:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the mastery of throwing stars and accuracy, along with the maximum number of throwing stars to recharge. It only applies when the character is throwing stars.
skill.description.4100001:
[Master Level : 30]
Enables the character to make a critical attack with throwing stars on a certain success rate.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Claw Mastery§r
skill.description.4100002:
[Master Level : 20]
Recovers additional amount of HP and MP.
skill.description.4101003:
[Master Level : 20]
Use HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the claw. It only applies when the character is equipped with a claw throwing stars.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Claw Mastery§r
skill.description.4101004:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily boosts the speed and jumping ability of everyone in the party.
skill.description.4101005:
[Master Level : 30]
Absorb some of the damage dished out to the enemy as HP. The most one can absorb at once is the character's Max HP / 2, and can't absorb more than the Max HP of the enemy.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Endure§r
skill.description.4200000:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the dagger mastery and accuracy. It only applies when the character has a dagger in hand.
skill.description.4201002:
[Master Level : 20]
Use HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the dagger. Only applies when the character has a dagger in hand. 
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Dagger Mastery§r
skill.description.4201004:
[Master Level : 30]
Steals one of the monster's items with a given success rate.  It works only once against the same monster.  The effort can be continued till its success.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Haste§r
skill.description.4201005:
[Master Level : 30]
Use MP to attack an enemy up to 6 times in a row with a dagger.
skill.description.5001001:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses MP to speed up the punch to rapidly attack enemies.
skill.description.5001002:
[Master Level : 20]
A devastating kick that accompanies a backward sommersault. Attacks all enemies in the vicinity.
skill.description.5001003:
[Master Level : 20]
Fires two bullets at once to apply double damage to monsters.
skill.description.5001005:
[Master Level : 10]
Press left or right arrow twice to temporarily boost your speed and jump.
skill.description.5100000:
[Master Level : 10]
Apply AP to Max HP to improve the rate of increase for Max HP.
skill.description.5100001:
[Master Level : 20]
Boosts the accuracy and the mastery of Knucklers. This skill only applies when you equip a Knuckler.
skill.description.5101002:
[Master Level : 20]
This skill allows you to quickly slide back and elbow multiple monsters at once to apply damage and temporarily stun them.
skill.description.5101003:
[Master Level : 20]
A quick round of two punches to apply damage and temporarily stun a monster.
skill.description.5101004:
[Master Level : 20]
This skill allows you to run forward and punch multiple monsters in front at once.
skill.description.5101005:
[Master Level : 10]
Recovers MP by using up a bit of HP.
skill.description.5101006:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses parts of HP and MP to temporarily boost the speed of a Knuckler. This skill can only be triggered when a Knuckler is equipped. 
Required Skill : §6Level 5 or above on Knuckler Mastery§r
skill.description.5101007:
[Master Level : 10]
This skill will allow you to safely navigate your way through monsters without being recognized by them...by donning an Oak Barrel. Some clever monsters may be able to tell, though, so be careful. If you are lying down, it's literally impossible to tell the difference!
skill.description.5200000:
[Master Level : 20]
Boosts the accuracy and the mastery of your Guns. This skill only applies when you equip a Gun.
skill.description.5201001:
[Master Level : 20]
Attacks multiple monsters by quickly firing a few bullets, so fast that the naked eye can't see the shooting.
skill.description.5201002:
[Master Level : 20]
Attacks a monster by throwing a grenade. The distance the grenade travels depends on how long you press the skill key.
skill.description.5201003:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses parts of HP and MP to temporarily boost the firing speed of the Gun.This skill can only be triggered when the Gun is equipped. 
Required Skill : §6Level 5 or above on Gun Mastery§r
skill.description.5201004:
[Master Level : 20]
This skill allows you to pretend shooting a gun, faking out the monsters, and instead of firing bullets, it'll fire a flag. This will temporarily stun up to 3 monsters.
skill.description.5201005:
[Master Level : 10]
Allows for a longer, more sustained jump than a regular jump.
skill.description.5201006:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses the recoil of the gun to run back after a gunshot. 
Required Skill : §6Level 5 or above on Wings§r

skill.description.level.3101004: MP -%1$s; attack for %2$s sec without using up an arrow.
skill.description.level.3200001:
%1$s%% Success rate,
final attack with crossbow damage %2$s%%
skill.description.level.3201002: HP -%1$s, MP -%1$s; improves crossbow speed for %2$s sec.
skill.description.level.4100000:

%3$s extra throwing stars.
skill.description.level.4100002: Additionally recovering HP %2$s, MP %3$s every %1$s sec.
skill.description.level.4101003: HP -%1$s, MP -%1$s; Increase in claw's attacking speed for %2$s sec.

skill.description.level.4201004: MP -%1$s, %2$s%% success rate to steal, apply %3$s%% in damage.
item.notice.charge_arrow: Since your arrow is not enough, your arrow in use has been replaced with [%s]. Amount: %s
item.notice.charge_throwing_star: Since your throwing-star is not enough, your throwing-star in use has been replaced with [%s]. Amount: %s
item.notice.scroll.destroy_chance: If failed, the item will be destroyed at a %s%% rate.
item.notice.scroll.chaos: Alters the equipment for better or worse.
item.notice.potion.debuff.all: Allows you to recover from any abnormal state.
item.notice.potion.debuff.seal: Allows you to recover from the state of curse or being sealed up.
item.notice.potion.debuff.poison: Cures the state of being poisoned.
item.notice.potion.bag: Place in your offhand and use any potion to store it in
item.notice.potion.bag2: Right click on an empty slot to take out
item.notice.potion.bag3: Stores at most 48 slots of potions

item.scroll.th_axe.accuracy.30: Dark Scroll for Two-handed Axe for Accuracy 30%%
item.scroll.th_axe.accuracy.60: Scroll for Two-handed Axe for Accuracy 60%%
item.scroll.th_axe.accuracy.70: Dark Scroll for Two-handed Axe for Accuracy 70%%
item.scroll.th_axe.accuracy.100: Scroll for Two-handed Axe for Accuracy 100%%
item.scroll.oh_sword.attack.10: Scroll for One-handed Sword for ATT 10%%
item.scroll.oh_sword.attack.30: Dark Scroll for One-handed Sword for ATT 30%%
item.scroll.oh_sword.attack.60: Scroll for One-handed Sword for ATT 60%%
item.scroll.oh_sword.attack.70: Dark Scroll for One-handed Sword for ATT 70%%
item.scroll.oh_sword.attack.100: Scroll for One-handed Sword for ATT 100%%
item.scroll.oh_sword.accuracy.10: Scroll for One-handed Sword for Accuracy 10%%
item.scroll.oh_sword.accuracy.30: Dark Scroll for One-handed Sword for Accuracy 30%%
item.scroll.oh_sword.accuracy.60: Scroll for One-handed Sword for Accuracy 60%%
item.scroll.oh_sword.accuracy.70: Dark Scroll for One-handed Sword for Accuracy 70%%

text.tutorial.sprint:
Throw out (Q)
any of the
skill items
text.menu.reset_point.ap:
Ability Point
6The points added to HP or MP will not be reset!r
text.menu.reset_point.ap.success: Your ability points have been reset! Open the CHAR STATS window to allocate them.
text.menu.reset_point.sp.success: Your skill points have been reset! Open the SKILLS window to allocate them.
text.meso.drop.min: Only the numbers higher than 10 are allowed.
text.meso.drop.max: Only the numbers lower than %s are allowed.
text.tip.drop_meso: Enter 7"/trigger drop_meso set <10~50000>"r to drop specified amount of mesos. 6(Click to copy)r
text.tip.hp_alert: Enter 7"/trigger hp_warning set <0~100>"r to set the percentage for HP alert. 6(Click to copy)r
text.tip.mp_alert: Enter 7"/trigger mp_warning set <0~100>"r to set the percentage for HP alert. 6(Click to copy)r
text.scroll.success: The scroll lights up, and then its mysterious power has been transferred to the item.
text.scroll.fail: The scroll lights up, but the item winds up as if nothing happened.
text.scroll.destroy: The item is destroyed due to the overwhelming power of the scroll.
text.npc.maple_administrator.menu: <Maple Administrator> How may I help you?
text.npc.maple_administrator.menu.reset_: <Maple Administrator> I have reset your MENU. Enter 7"/trigger command set -1"r to reset the book anytime.
text.npc.maple_administrator.menu.how_to: <Maple Administrator> Place the throwing-stars or arrows in your cmainhandr, and right click to equip them. Equipped throwing-stars or arrows will be consumed automatically when you attack.
<Maple Administrator> Place the item in your cmainhandr and right click on it.
<Maple Administrator> Place the equipment you want to scroll in your coffhandr, and place the scroll in your cmainhandr, then right click to scroll the equipment.
text.npc.maple_administrator.menu.potion: <Maple Administrator> You must be struggling with your inventory. Make good use of this Potion Bag to save your slots.
text.npc.gachapon.require_slot: <Gachapon> Please leave a slot of your bag empty.
text.npc.mu_lung_dojo_bulletin_board.tal: <Mu Lung Dojo Bulletin Board> Anyone who has the courage to challenge Mu Lung Dojo, welcome to step in! -Wu Gong-
text.npc.so_gong.talk:
<So Gong> My master is the strongest in this dojo. You dare to challenge him? You will regret it!
...I really want to say that, but sadly our dojo is under renovation, so it is unopened for now. Nevertheless, you are still welcome to use the training room here, just be careful not to break anything!
text.npc.so_gong.enter_train: 7> 9I want to use the training room.r
text.npc.so_gong.explain.train:
<So Gong> Mu Lung Dojo has the best training room in the world! There is a machine that can spawn specific mobs endlessly, simply by putting a monster card into it. My master can keep training there with no break for three whole days. As for you? I think it won't last for more than 10 minutes.
All the available cards are in the barrel beside the machine. You can recharge it by stepping on the pressure plate around it.
text.quest.tutorial.not_yet: Seems like you haven't complete the tutorial yet. If you want to skip the tutorial, please right click again.
text.quest.tutorial.roger.greet: <Roger> Welcome to MapleCraft! I'm here to teach you some basics. Talk to me again if you're ready.
text.quest.tutorial.roger.apple: <Roger> Being scared? Your character dies if your HP drops to 0, you won't want to see that happened. Now eat the apple I gave you to recover your HP.
text.quest.tutorial.roger.apple_teach: <Roger> Place the apple in your cmainhandr and right click to use it.
text.quest.tutorial.roger.apple_complete:
<Roger> Good job! Besides when you run out of potions in your hotbar, it will try to restore from your bag.
Next I'm going to teach you how to fight in MapleCraft, talk to me again if you're ready.
text.quest.tutorial.roger.attack:
<Roger> Hunting mobs is the major way to raise your abilities. See the 9attack itemr in your hotbar? Right click with it to attack the mobs. The vertical angle of your vision won't affect your attack range.
Oh there's one more thing. You can pick up dropped items by 9sneakingr around them.
Now try to defeat the 9Jr. Sentinelsr around and collect 91 Jr. Sentinel Shellpiecer.
text.quest.tutorial.roger.attack_teach: <Roger> Right click with the 9attack itemr to attack the mobs. Defeat the 9Jr. Sentinelsr around and collect 91 Jr. Sentinel Shellpiecer.
text.quest.tutorial.roger.attack_complet:
<Roger> Perfect! Your level has raised up. Beside the basic attack, there are many skills that play an important role in your fight. Now open the SKILLS window with your MENU item, and spend the skill point on any of your skills. After that, click on the skill icon to get the skill item and try to use it!
b(Press 't' to interact with the skill window)r
text.quest.tutorial.roger.skill_teach:
<Roger> Open the SKILLS window with your MENU item, and spend the skill point on any of your skills. After that, click on the skill icon to get the skill item and right click with it to use it!
b(Press 't' to interact with the skill window)r
text.quest.tutorial.roger.skill_complete: <Roger> You have done so well! You might have seen the CHAR STATS window in your MENU. When you level up, you get both skill points and stat points. Don't forget to distribute them on your demand.
text.quest.tutorial.roger.equip: <Roger> I just gave you a weapon called 9Razorr, which is better than your current weapon. You will need powerful weapons to fight against the mobs. Now place the 9Razorr in your mainhand and right click to equip it.
text.quest.tutorial.roger.equip_teach: <Roger> Place the equipment in your cmainhandr and right click to equip it. You will get a weapon for display after you successfully equiped a weapon, and you may place it in your offhand as a decoration.
text.quest.tutorial.roger.equip_complete:
<Roger> Well done! Don't forget to check your equipments through the EQUIPMENT window in your MENU, and you can also take them off by clicking on them.
Now enter the light and right click to start the next tutorial!
text.quest.tutorial.roger.next_stage: <Roger> Enter the light and right click to move to the next tutorial map!
text.quest.tutorial.pio.greet: <Pio> Hey there! Are you free for a moment? I need some materials for my house. Can you collect 910 Old Wooden Boardr and 910 Rusty Screwr from the boxes around? You can break the boxes using normal attack.
text.quest.tutorial.pio.box_complete:
<Pio> You have collected all the materials? Thank you very much! I can continue my house building now.
Please talk to me later, I have a gift for you.
text.quest.tutorial.pio.give_chair:
<Pio> I made a chair using the remaining materials as a thank you gift. Your HP will recover faster when sitting on it.
You can pass the light accross the hill to leave here. Hope you enjoy your adventure!
text.quest.tutorial.pio.bye:
<Pio> How does the chair feel?
(Pass the light to leave the tutorial.)
text.quest.test_server_helper.menu: <Mr. Goldstein> I'm helping adventurers now. Which assistance do you need?
text.quest.test_transfer.notice: cBe careful! Your level will be reset.r
text.quest.test_transfer.complete: Your job has changed! You can get the basic equipments in the barrels. Step on the pressure plate to reset the barrels.
text.quest.test_warrior_transfer.menu: <Dances with Balrog> For those that want to become a warrior, come see me...
text.quest.test_magician_transfer.menu: <Grendel the Really Old> To all that desire to become a magician...talk to me...
text.quest.test_archer_transfer.menu: <Athena Pierce> Those who want to become a bowman... Please come...
text.quest.test_thief_transfer.menu: <Dark Lord> To those that want to be a thief, come...
text.quest.test_shop.menu: <%s> I'm here for throwing-stars recharging and item selling. Please right click on the signs on your demand.
text.quest.party_quest.common.menu.enter: 7> 1I want to do the Party Quest!r
text.quest.party_quest.common.leave_conf: <%s> If you leave now, you can't come back here again. Are you sure you want to leave?
text.quest.party_quest.common.member_los: <%s> Seems that some of the members have not arrived yet. Please talk to me later until all of the members arrive.
text.quest.party_quest.common.portal_clo: The portal is closed for now.
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.menu: <Lakelis> What do you want to know about the lFirst Time Togetherr party quest?
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.menu.enter.re: <Lakelis> Only players over level 21 can join the 9First Time Togetherr party quest.
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.menu.enter.fa: <Lakelis> There is already a team doing the party quest. Please talk to me later.
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.menu.intro.de:
<Lakelis> There are 5 stages in the 9First Time Togetherr Party Quest. Please work together with your teammates, share your strengths and wisdom to solve the challenges, and defeat the vicious cKing Slimer! If you want to give up during the Party Quest, you can talk to 9Nellar to exit.
l- Level:r 21 or above
l- Time Limit:r 30 min
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.stage1.introd: <Cloto> Here, you need to collect 9couponsr by defeating the same number of Ligators as the answer to the questions asked individually, and exchange the Pass with your coupons. Collect %s 9passesr and I'll make the portal that sends you to the next stage.
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.stage1.wrong_: <Cloto> That's not the right number. I will repeat the question, please listen carefully.
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.stage1.requir: <Cloto> Here's the question. Collect the same number of coupons as %s.
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.stage1.questi: the minimum amount of level needed to make the first job advancement as a warrior
the minimum amount of level needed to make the first job advancement as a bowman
the minimum amount of level needed to make the first job advancement as a thief
the minimum amount of STR level needed to make the first job advancement as a warrior
the minimum amount of DEX level needed to make the first job advancement as a bowman
the minimum amount of DEX level needed to make the first job advancement as a thief
the minimum amount of level needed to make the first job advancement as a magician
the minimum amount of level needed to make the first job advancement as a magician
the EXP needed from level 1 to level 2
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.stage1.requir: <Cloto> Give me %s 9passesr and I'll make the portal that sends you to the next stage.
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.stage1.get_pa: <Cloto> That's the right amount of coupons, here is the Pass.
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.stage1.pass: <Cloto> You gathered up %s 9passesr! Congratulation on clearing the stage! I'll make the portal that sends you to the next stage. There's a time limit on getting there, so please hurry. Best of luck to you all!
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.stage2.wrong_: <Cloto> You have to grab 3 out of the 4 ropes by different members at the same time. Find the right combination and I'll make the portal that sends you to the next stage. If you don't have enough players, step on the pressure plate and get some dummies.
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.stage3.wrong_: <Cloto> You have to stand on 3 out of the 5 platforms by different members at the same time. Find the right combination and I'll make the portal that sends you to the next stage. If you don't have enough players, step on the pressure plate and get some dummies.
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.stage4.wrong_: <Cloto> You have to stand on 3 out of the 6 barrels by different members at the same time. Find the right combination and I'll make the portal that sends you to the next stage. If you don't have enough players, step on the pressure plate and get some dummies.
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.stage5.requir: <Cloto> Welcome to the final stage. Here, you have to collect 9passesr by defeating King Slime and other mobs. Give me 910 passesr and I'll make the final portal for you.
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.stage5.pass: <Cloto> Congratulation! You have complete all of the stages. Talk to me again and I'll give you some rewards then send you to the bonus stage. You can keep hunting there until the time limit or leave directly.
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.require_slot: <Cloto> Please leave 2 slots of your bag empty for the reward.
text.quest.party_quest.kpq.go_next: <Cloto> You have all cleared this stage, go to the next stage through the portal behind me.
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.menu: <Red Sign> What do you want to know about the lDimensional Crackr party quest?
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.menu.enter.r: <Red Sign> Only players over level 35 can join the 9Dimensional Crackr party quest.
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.menu.enter.f: <Red Sign> There is already a team doing the party quest. Please talk to me later.
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.menu.intro.d:
<Red Sign> There are 9 stages in the 9Dimensional Crackr Party Quest. Please collect passes of dimension to explore deeper area, and defeat the fallen gate keeper cAlisharr to get the key of dimension.
If you want to give up during the Party Quest, you can talk to 9Sgt. Andersonr to exit.
l- Level:r 35 or above
l- Time Limit:r 60 min
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.go_next: <%s> You have all cleared this stage, go to the next stage through the dimensional door beside me.
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.stage_pass: <%s> You gathered up 9%s Passes of Dimensionr! I have opened the portal that sends you to the next stage. Hurry up and get to the next area!
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.pick_support: Item collector activated. The items dropped in this stage will be teleported to the nearest player every second.
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.stage1.requi: <Red Balloon> Please eliminate the Ratzs from another dimension and collect 925 Passes of Dimensionr, so that I can open the dimension door to the next stage for you!
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.stage2.requi: <Orange Balloon> Please search the boxes and collect 915 Passes of Dimensionr, so that I can open the dimension door to the next stage for you!
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.stage3.requi: <Yellow Balloon> Bloctopuses from another dimension have hidden in the boxes around here, please eliminate them and collect 932 Passes of Dimensionr, so that I can open the dimension door to the next stage for you!
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.stage4.requi:
<Lime Balloon> Please eliminate Dark Eyes and Shadow Eyes from Another Dimension and collect 96 Passes of Dimensionr, so that I can open the dimension door to the next stage for you!
Both eyes have different weakness and are vulnerable only with their eyes opened. Please see the opportunity to attack!
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.stage5.requi:
<Green Balloon> Please search the boxes after passing the dimensional machines and collect 924 Passes of Dimensionr, so that I can open the dimension door to the next stage for you!
Beware of the King Block Golems, they are extremly dangerous! You should always hide yourself from them while moving forward.
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.stage6.expla: <Aqua Balloon> The route to the next stage is hidden in the boxes. Stand on the boxes and right click to trigger the mechanism. Only one of the three boxes can teleport you to the next floor, while the others teleport you to the start point. Get a move on and find out the route with your teammates!
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.stage7.requi: <Sky-Blue Balloon> The Passes of Dimension dropped by the mobs bring powerful rombards from another dimension to here. Please eliminate them and collect 93 Passes of Dimensionr, so that I can open the dimension door to the next stage for you!
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.stage7.summo: Rombard is summoned somewhere in the map.
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.stage8.wrong:
<Blue Balloon> A password is set here. You have to stand on 5 out of the 9 boxes by different members at the same time. Find the right combination so that I can open the dimension door to the next stage for you!
If you don't have enough players, step on the pressure plate and get some dummies.
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.stage9.requi: <Violet Balloon> We finally reached the throne where Alishar is, but it seems like he have hidden himself in the crack of dimensions. You have to pull him out with the power of Passes of Dimension. Please eliminate him to get the key of dimension, then I can seal the dimensional crack up again!
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.award: <Arturo> What a great job! You have resolved the crisis of Ludibrium! I have prepared some present for you, please talk to me again.
text.quest.party_quest.ldpq.require_slot: <Arturo> Your bag seems a bit full. Please leave 2 slots of your bag empty and talk to me again.
